scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, wearing a crown of thorns and a loincloth, his body marked by wounds. To the right, a man in a pink robe and blue mantle kneels with his hands clasped in prayer, looking up at Christ. The background features a hilly landscape with trees and a distant building, all under a bright blue sky. The entire scene is framed by an arched border.
